This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw bright star moving. Then made fast loops. Then moved away fast.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 6:15pm I went outside to get some things from my truck, and noticed a bright star moving in the western sky. It was brighter than any other star in the sky. I wanted a picture, so I took my items inside and grabbed a cell phone camera, and returned outside. At first I did not think it real, but then I wanted to show someone else what I had seen. The object had moved over top of a neighbors house about 150 yards away to the west. I placed the camera on the truck's roof to stabilize the shot. All of a sudden the object made a visible looping trail and I snapped the shot. the reddish glow at the bottom of the picture is the front porch light of the neighbors house. The object then sped away to the north-west and faded away to nothing.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
